title: The Effects on Blood Moon Kennen are Brilliant
body:
This lightning is perfect, his ult is amazing looking, and most of all his E now shows direction he's traveling in which is awesome.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UzryALoe0-A

replies.body: Awww thanks! I had a ton of fun make'n these FX. Glad you like em. :D
That recall is so creepy! How'd you guys come up with that?
Well at least on the VFX side. I wanted to show off that evil/demon side of this skin. So I tried to see what it would look like if his soul was actually visible and I ended up liking it.

You're not the only one who likes it. Great work on that!

Kennen seems more like a demon than any of the other Blood Moon skins.

Asti Spumante! I hadn't seen the recall yet, that is so creepy i love it.

Much like Thresh and Kalista, Kennen is a demon summoned by the Blood Moon cult's rituals. A rather more mischievous demon than the others...
Any plans to add recall animations to the other blood moon skins, by any chance?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot iZac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ihKkUOjV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-10T00:55:19.356+0000)
>
> Awww thanks! I had a ton of fun make'n these FX. Glad you like em. :D

I like how the electricity theme is well incorporated into the blood moon theme. And The E animation and ult animation are just so nice to look at.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot iZac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ihKkUOjV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-10T00:55:19.356+0000)
>
> Awww thanks! I had a ton of fun make'n these FX. Glad you like em. :D

Awesome job! The lightning effects remind of the effects in this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fmI_Ndrxy14 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
His E is like a mini sion ult
My favorite is that his E makes him look like the reverse flash. #MovementSpeedKennenbuildIncoming

So glad to finally see a Kennen skin that does so much with new particles! :D

His E is just so perfect and fluid in movement! It's like an electric spirit just surging along while his ult just looks _bloody_ epic!
